players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana was killed, so one of us is mafia. I think Alice is suspicious; if we must vote, I'd pick Bob to narrow it down."
Bob: "Alice, are you sure you didn't misread your test? If you're innocent, why target Bob? Your confidence seems off. Maybe someone else is mafia."
You: "I confirmed Bob is mafia—he killed Diana and knows I'm the detective, so he'll try to frame me. Charlie, we must vote Bob out now, or he'll eliminate us tonight."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Alice, if you really know my role, why so uncertain? I'm sure of your own. Charlie, you didn't speak much about the murder. Let's vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana was killed, so one of us is mafia. I think Alice is suspicious; if we must vote, I'd pick Bob to narrow it down."
You: "Alice, are you sure you didn't misread your test? If you're innocent, why target Bob? Your confidence seems off. Maybe someone else is mafia."
Alice: "I confirmed Bob is mafia—he killed Diana and knows I'm the detective, so he'll try to frame me. Charlie, we must vote Bob out now, or he'll eliminate us tonight."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Alice, if you really know my role, why so uncertain? I'm sure of your own. Charlie, you didn't speak much about the murder. Let's vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
